name: CSA Service Request APIs
description:
• Submit a service request to create, modify or cancel a subscription
• Issue user actions on a subscription
• Resubmit a modify request that has failed
• Submit a request based on an existing request

requests.headers:
Accept: application/json
Content-Type: application/json

"requestReference":"<Subscription ID to modify>",
"subscriptionName":"<Name of the Subscription to modify>",
"subscriptionDescription":"<Description>",
"action":"MODIFY_SUBSCRIPTION",
"actionProperty": []
}
